thread.title: Milagros del Pilar Yus Ly
thread.title_full: CheapOair.com reviewed by Milagros del Pilar Yus Ly

author: Milagros del Pilar Yus Ly
title: Milagros del Pilar Yus Ly
text:
Cheapoair is asking me to pay $823.40 to complete my mother's name in her ticket from Santiago Chile to USA. I consider that is an immense amount of money is exactly another ticker. And I think the change name is not a huge procedure other then adding to words in my mothers name.
The incompetency of the first person who didn't understood very well my mothers name, affected the determination of misunderstanding my mothers complete name.
I'm hoping still that you can help me by completing my mothers name with out any extra charge.
